title: This Is Your FBI and Dragnet
description: We begin this week's Case Closed with The Fugitive Pirate, the March 14, 1947, episode of This Is Your FBI. (30:37) Our second story is the January 29, 1954, broadcast of Dragnet titled, The Big Chick. https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr12022/CaseClosed800.mp3  Download CaseClosed800 Support Case Closed!
